summary: Frontend testing completed for Session 3 features: Dashboard Overview, Gaming Session with server selection, and WebSocket real-time chat. All features working correctly.
critical_code_review_comments: WebSocket connection shows initial failure then reconnects - this is expected behavior with fallback to polling
Console shows 'WebSocket is closed before the connection is established' but then successfully connects - may want to suppress this warning in production
seed_data_creation: Created test session 'Test Session from Iteration 2' with server selection
context_for_next_testing_agent: All Session 3 features verified working. Dashboard shows 7 total servers (0 running, 7 stopped). WebSocket chat is live. Gaming sessions with server selection working.

dashboard_overview.notes: Shows Total Servers (7), Running (0), Stopped (7), Health (0%), Orchestrators Status with server counts (Warcamp Server 0/7)

orchestrators_status.notes: Shows 'Warcamp Server 0/7' with correct running/total count

create_session_modal.notes: Modal opens with all fields: Title, Description, Orchestrator dropdown, Server dropdown, Scheduled Time, Duration

server_selection_dropdown.notes: Server dropdown shows all servers from selected orchestrator: minesofazhul (enshrouded), bigwideworld (palworld), ocs (valheim), rinesceb (valheim)

websocket_chat_live_indicator.notes: '‚óè Live' indicator shows green when WebSocket connected

chat_realtime_messages.notes: Messages appear in real-time after sending via WebSocket

active_servers_section.notes: Shows 'No servers running' correctly when 0 servers are running

gaming_sessions_with_rsvp.notes: Sessions display with title, description, date, attendee count, server, and Join/Leave RSVP buttons
